title: The merry bell-man's out-cryes, or, The city's O yes being a mad merry ditty both pleasant and witty, to be cry'd in prick-song prose through country and city ... / not by L.P. but J.C.
author: J. C.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed in the year of Bartledum Fair, 1655, when few honest men can thrive,
